page.title: 12SCHOOLS
page.content:
KEYWORTH INFANT SCHOOL There is a head teacher called Mrs S Barwick. The school has 144 children and there are 6 classrooms.
SOUTH WOLDS COMPREHENSIVE SCHOOL South Wolds opened in 1967 and it stands on an semi open plan site. The school has 72 staff plus Mr Langton the headmaster. The school has 1250 children. South wolds is the main school in Keyworth (There are alot of children who go on the school bus there are 120 children that go to Kinolton,20 to Willoughby,30 to 40 to Bradmore and 100 to Tollerton.
CROSSDALE DRIVE PRIMARY SCHOOL Crossdale Drive School is a modern type school with open plan classrooms. The classrooms are quite big and the children age between 5 and 11.
